About the Company: Gokaldas Exports Ltd is the largest exporter of garments inIndia. The company manufactures blazers and pants (formal and casuals), shorts, shirts, blouses, denim wear, swim wear, active and sports wear.The company also operates retail chain of garment under the brand name `The Wearhouse`. These outlets are located in Banglore, Chennai, Hyderabad and Coimbatore.The company also has strategic alliances with various fashion giants namely Nike, Mexx, Mustang, Greg Norman, Reebok, Oxbow, Old Navy, Banana Republic, Levis, Dockers, Macys Merchandising Group, Diesel and Puma are amongst others.
